message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a little more to start, and we avoid inflation eating our money!
I think I deserve a bit more, considering I'm taking the risk of inflation!
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
I'll take a bit more, since you didn't take my previous offer and we're losing value to inflation!
Bob, this is ridiculous. I'm taking a small hit to end this now before inflation eats even more of our money. Take it or leave it!
